titleStmt.title: A learned and profitable treatise of Gods prouidence Written for the instruction and comfort of the godly: for the winning and conuersion of sinners: and for a terror to the obstinate and prophane: diuided into sixe parts. By Ralph Walker preacher of the Word.
titleStmt.author: Walker, Ralph, preacher of the word.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by Felix Kyngston for Thomas Man,
